content:
I get the following linter error:

/- The `fails_quickly` linter reports: -/
/- TYPE CLASS SEARCHES TIMED OUT.
For the following classes, there is an instance that causes a loop, or an excessively long search. -/
-- geometry/manifold/smooth_manifold_with_corners.lean
#print smooth_manifold_with_corners /- type-class inference timed out -/

How do I debug this?
